text: A depth-first search is performed on a directed acyclic graph. Let d[u] denote the time at which vertex u is visited for the first time and f[u] the time at which the DFS call to the vertex u terminates. Which of the following statements is always TRUE for all edges (u, v) in the graph ? A dlu] < d[v] B.du] < f1] c. flu] < 1] 0. flu] > f[v] gateit-2007 algorithms graph-algorithms normal graph-search
